Value:
500 g flour
7g yeast
325 ml water
pinch of salt
1 T olive oil

Mix and knead for 10 min.

Prove for 40 min.  Add plenty of olive oil in pan along with corn starch or semolina.  place dough in pan, drizzle more olive oil and poke holes into it, add toppings.

Prove for 45 minutes.  Bake 400 F for 20 - 25 minutes.
